PIN#:
Instructions for resetting your pin # (optional, but recommended):
1. Select ‘My Settings’ 2. Select ‘E-Pin’ 3. Enter your old pin (enter provided pin #) 4. Enter your new pin (4-digits only) 5. Verify pin (enter new pin # again) 6. Select ‘Change’
If you have any questions or need assistance please call 646-690-4288. For trade specific assistance, please contact your ClearPar closer at 646-690-4300.
Best Regards,
